message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $11,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $9,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to go down to $10,000? That's the highest I'm willing to go.
